SA15bsa069_u:4: yadi [bhavatocyate] bhavadvacanaṃ nyāyyaṃ, paramasmadvacanamanyāyyaṃ tanna yuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:5: kiñca yadanyāyyaṃ tadetatsvato nyāyyaṃ, tasmād yadanyāyyaṃ tannāsti /
SA15bsa069_u:9: mama vacanamanyāyyamiti cedbhavatocyate, tato bhavānajña iti spaṣṭam /
SA15bsa069_u:13: abhinnaṃ cedvacanamapi nāstīti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti bhavatā kathamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:14: atha bhinnaṃ, tato vacanaṃ nyāyyamiti mama vacanamanyāyyamiti kathaṃ bhavatocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:18: yathā gośṛṅge 'śvakarṇau vā parasparaṃ khaṇḍayituṃ na śaknuvataḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:27: tato 'smadvacanaṃ bhavataśca khaṇḍanamityetayoretat khaṇḍanametacca khaṇḍanīyamiti viśeṣo na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:31: svakhaṇḍanārthañcet, tataḥ svataḥ svārthahīnaṃ bhavedasmadvacananu siddham /
SA15bsa069_u:39: yato yadi kumārī putravatīti na sampadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:44: bhavānasmākaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvānyāyyaṃ manyate cet, tattarhi śrutatvātpratyakṣasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:46: yathā kaścinmanyeta śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyānupalabdhiratha śrotravijñānataḥ śabdasyopalabdhiḥ pratyakṣasidveti,
SA15bsa069_u:55: yadi hetumāṃstadānityaḥ śabdo, yadi nityo naiva hetumān /
SA15bsa069_u:71: iha loke vacanaṃ phalaṃ, nyāyo heturiti /
SA15bsa069_u:72: iha loke yadā phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā sahetukaṃ jñātam /
SA15bsa069_u:76: yad bhavatoktaṃ mama vacanamanyahisaṃvāditvāditi tadidamidānīṃ bhavatā sārdhaṃ vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:82: yadi bhavadartho 'smaduktādanyastadānyatvadoṣo bhavata eva na tu mama /
SA15bsa069_u:83: yadi nānyat, tarhi matpakṣatulyameva, tena nāstyanyatvam /
SA15bsa069_u:87: yathā manuṣyo goranyo na gaurbhavati, yadyanyadanyasmādanyat, tadā tadekaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:92: yadyāvayorbheda eva na syānna tadā bhavatā vivādo 'haṃ tu bhavadarthameva vadāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:93: sarvamuktamanyaditi ced, bhavatāpi kiñciduktamiti bhavānapyanyadvadatīti doṣo bhavata eva /
SA15bsa069_u:95: tarhi mamāpi vacanaṃ nānyaditi yad bhavatoktamahamanyadvadāmīti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:98: yad (bhavato)ktaṃ mama vacanamasiddhamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:100: yadi vacanasyāsiddhatvaṃ, tadā vacanameva na prāptam /
SA15bsa069_u:101: atha vacanaṃ na prāptaṃ, kathaṃ bhavatocyate mayā yaduktaṃ tadasiddhamiti /
SA15bsa069_u:104: yadi sarvaṃ vacanamasiddha, tarhi bhavaduktaṃ mama khaṇdanamapyasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:105: yadi bhavaduktaṃ khaṇḍanamasiddhaṃ na syāt, tarhi mama vacanamapi naivāsiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:109: yadyasiddha na svataḥ siddhaṃ, tadāsiddhaṃ na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:110: yadi siddhaṃ, nāstyasiddhaṃ, tato yad (bhavato)ktaṃ maduktamasiddhamiti tanniravakāśam /
SA15bsa069_u:111: yadi bhavatocyate mama khaṇḍanamananubhāṣaṇameva tadā na mama matasyopalabdhi /
SA15bsa069_u:112: [Tś_7] atha nopalabhyate mama mataṃ, tato mama khaṇḍanaṃ kartuṃ na śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:114: yadi bhavān matkhaṇḍanaṃ nānubhāṣate, tadā bhavān khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ na śaknoti /
SA15bsa069_u:115: kiṃ punarmanyate bhavān khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ śakyaṃ,
SA15bsa069_u:120: athavā khaṇḍanamanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyaṃ, tadā sadaiva khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:123: na ca sa kālo vidyate yatra na khaṇḍanānubhāṣaṇam /
SA15bsa069_u:124: [ataḥ] yatra khaṇḍanaṃ vaktuṃ śakyate sa kālo nāsti /
SA15bsa069_u:127: ananubhāṣya tu khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ ja śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:133: ananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti ced,
SA15bsa069_u:134: ananubhāṣyāpi tataḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:135: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanam nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyamiti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:136: dvitīyamapi khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa069_u:137: dvitīyaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ nāmānanubhāṣya khaṇḍanamiti vaktuṃ śakyata iti cet,
SA15bsa069_u:138: prathamaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ [Tś_8] nāmāpyananubhāṣya khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuṃ śakyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:142: tadā khaṇḍanaṃ nāma vaktuaṃ śakyate natvananubhāṣya vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:143: yadi punaḥ khaṇḍanamananubhāṣya vadet, khaṇḍanasya nigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:144: yadi bhavān svakhaṇḍanaṃ nānubhāṣate, tato bhavaduktakhaṇḍanasya nigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:148: kiñca yadā bhavadvacanaṃ mama[mataṃ] khaṇḍayati, tadāhamanubhāṣe /
SA15bsa069_u:149: yadā tvahaṃ bhavanmataṃ khaṇḍayāmi tadā bhavānapyanubhāṣate /
SA15bsa069_u:154: sarve śabdā yadā mukhānnirgatāstadā naṣṭā eveti kathaṃ madvacanānubhāṣaṇam? /
SA15bsa069_u:158: naṣṭa iti cen, na kiñcidanubhāṣitavyaṃ tadabhāvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:159: śabdo naṣṭa iti cet, tvadanubhāṣaṇāyaitanme vacanamiti yadbhavān bravīti sa kutarka eva /
SA15bsa069_u:161: ktaṃ madvacanaṃ pūrva, [bhavata] khaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāditi tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
SA15bsa069_u:163: yadi madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ, khaṇḍanantu paścāditi tanyāyyam /
SA15bsa069_u:164: kuta iti [Tś_9] cen, madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavadvacanaṃ tu paścāditi /
SA15bsa069_u:165: yadyasmadvacanaṃ paravartivacanaṃ khaṇḍayati, tato 'smadartho viśiṣyate bhavadvacanasya tu hāniḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:166: kiñca yadyucyate bhavatā sarvāṇi vacanāni pūrvavartīni khaṇḍanantu paravartīti,
SA15bsa069_u:167: tadā bhavānapi pūrvameva vacanaṃ vadatīti paścātkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:171: yacca khaṇḍanaṃ pūrvasya paravartīti svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścādasti /
SA15bsa069_u:172: yadi svabhāvata eva pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ paścāt syāt, tadā pūrvaṃ paścādityubhe na syātām /
SA15bsa069_u:174: yadi svabhāvataḥ pūrvasya khaṇḍanaṃ na paścāt /
SA15bsa069_u:176: tadā pūrvasyāpi khaṇḍanaṃ parabhāvi na bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:177: yadbhavatoktaṃ madvacanaṃ pūrvaṃ, khaṇḍanaṃ tu parabhāvi tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:178: yadabhihitaṃ bhavatā, mayā hetvantaramuktamiti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicārya nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:181: kathamiti ced, bhavatā pūrvahetuṃ parityajya hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanāt /
SA15bsa069_u:182: yadi hetvantarapratiṣṭhāpanādbhavato na nigrahasthānatvāpattistadā mamāpi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:185: yadyanyaṃ hetuṃ na vadeyaṃ, tato bhavaddhetuṃ vadeyam /
SA15bsa069_u:190: api ca yadi sarvāṇi vacanāni hetvantarāṇi syustadābhavaduktāni vacanānyapi hetvantarāṇi bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:192: atha vacanānyuccārayannapi na bhavān nigrāhyastarhi yadbhavatoktaṃ hetuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayannahaṃ nigrāhya iti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:193: yadbhavatoktamarthāntaraṃ vadāmīti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ) vicāryaṃ nirdhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:194: anyā me pratijñā, anyā ca bhavata iti yattannyāyyameva /
SA15bsa069_u:196: yadi matamasmadartho bhavadarthādananyastadāsmadartho bhavadarthapratipakṣatayā na virudvo /
SA15bsa069_u:197: yadi bhavānasmadarthaṃ khaṇḍayati, tarhi bhavataḥ svārthasyaiva khaṇḍanaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:202: aparañca yaduktaṃ sarvaṃ tadarthāntarañcettadā bhavaduktamapyarthāntaraṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:203: yadi bhavaduktamarthāntaraṃ na bhavettadā yadbhavatā pratijñātaṃ sarvamarthāntaramiti tadayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:214: tataśca yadi bhavān māṃ khaṇḍayati, tarhi svārthasyaiva khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:219: tataśca yadbhavatoktaṃ bhavān pūrvavacanaṃ vadatīti tanmithyā /
SA15bsa069_u:224: yadyahaṃ tadvadaṃstanna sādhayituṃ śaknomi, tadā yadbhavatoktamananyaditi tadyuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:226: ktaṃ mayā sarvamuktaṃ nānujñāyata iti tadidānīṃ (bhavatā sārdhaṃ)
SA15bsa069_u:228: sarvaṃ nānujñāyata iti yaduktaṃ bhavatā etadvacanaṃ sarvasminnantarbhavati na vā? /
SA15bsa069_u:229: yadi tāvatsarvasminnantarbhavati tadā bhavān svayaṃ svoktaṃ nānujānāti /
SA15bsa069_u:230: yadi svayaṃ nānujānātyasmadarthaḥ svata eva siddho bhavedbhavavacanasya tu hāniḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:231: atha sarvasminnāntarbhavati tadā tasya sarvatvameva na syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:232: yadi sarvatvameva na bhavet, tadā bhavatā yadananujñātaṃ tatsarvam /
SA15bsa069_u:242: yadi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ khaṇḍanaṃ samyagarthena na saṃyuktaṃ syāttadā tadviparītakhaṇḍanamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:258: śabdo 'pi tatheti śabdo 'nitya iti sthāpite prativādī prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:263: yannityaṃ na tatprayatnenotpannaṃ yathākāśaṃ nityaṃ na prayatnenotpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:266: yadi (śabdasya) nityākāśavaidharmyacchabdo 'nitya iti, tadā kiṃ prāptam? /
SA15bsa069_u:267: yadyākāśasādharmyaṃ [Tś_13] tato nitya eva śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:275_0: prativādī tvanaikāntikaikarasārthapratyavasthānena khaṇḍanaṃ bhāṣate yathā yadi bhavān
SA15bsa069_u:275_1: sādharmyeṇa śabdasyānityatāṃ sthāpayati tadāhamapi vaidharmyeṇa śabdasya nityatāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:276: yadi ca bhavadarthaḥ siddho mamāpyarthaḥ siddho bhavediti /
SA15bsa069_u:284: yadi bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpito heturasmaddhetutulyobhavettadā samyakkhaṇḍanaṃ sidhyeta /
SA15bsa069_u:288: tadānityatāviparyāsadoṣo vyaktīkartuṃ na śakyata iti prasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:298: yadi śabdo nityākāśavidharmyādanitya iti, tadā kiṃ prāptam /
SA15bsa069_u:299: yadi ghaṭavaidharmyaṃ śabdasya, tadā sa nitya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:302: (śāstramāha) śabdo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt / yathā ghaṭo 'nityaḥ kṛtakatvāt, tathā śabdo 'pi /
SA15bsa069_u:304: yadi ghaṭasādharmyācchabdasyānityatā bhavatā sthāpitā, tadā kiṃ prāptam? /
SA15bsa069_u:305: śabdo nitya eva ghaṭavaidharmyādvaidharmyamamūrtatvam / ghaṭastu mūrtaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:311: yo 'smābhiḥ sthāpito hetuḥ kṛtakatvācchabdo 'nitya iti tasya (hetoḥ)
SA15bsa069_u:314: yaḥ punarbhavatpratiṣṭhāpito hetuḥ śabdo nityo 'mūrtatvāditi tasya pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartata ityasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:321: pakkatvamapakvatvaṃ, cākṣuṣatvamacākṣuṣatvamityādi evaṃ ghaṭaśabdayoḥ pratyekaṃ viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:338: bhavaddhetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe ca vartate tasmādasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:339: bhavaddheturmama (heto) stulyo matpratijñāyāśca khaṇḍanāsamartha iti cet /
SA15bsa069_u:341: yadatulyaṃ tulyamiti bhavatoktaṃ tasmādbhavataḥ khaṇḍanaṃ viparītam /
SA15bsa069_u:345: yadi vartikā kṣudrā jyotirapi kṣudram, iti sthāpite /
SA15bsa069_u:346: prativādī prāha yadi sādharmyādyathā ghaṭādyanityaṃ śabdo 'pi tathā syāttadā sarvasya sarveṇāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:351: sadharmāṇyapi sarvāṇi vastūni viśeṣṭavastubhyo bhinnānīti cecchabdo 'pi tathā /
SA15bsa069_u:358: sarveṣāṃ na mayā sattvādisādharmyaṃ pratiṣidvamapi tu teṣāṃ viśeṣa evāvadhāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:360: taccāsmābhiranityatāsādhanāyocyate na tu sādharmyamātramupādīyate na khalvasti sā kāpi yuktiryā naivaṃ vicāryate /
SA15bsa069_u:362: naikamapi vidyate tādṛśaṃ yadanyavastuno na sadṛśaṃ na ca viśiṣṭaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:383: yadi siddhā pratijñopādīyate 'siddhastu heturbhavataḥ khaṇḍanasya viparyāso 'dhikataro bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:384: sarveṣāṃ vastūnāṃ pūrvamabhūtvā paścādabhāva iti mayoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:387: yadi pūrvaṃ śabdaḥ sanneva na cāsti pratibandhastadā kasmācchrotreṇa nopalabhyate /
SA15bsa069_u:390: iṣṭasādhanaṃ ca na yuktisampannaṃ so 'rtho nirasanīyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:394: atha hetuḥ sādhyaṃ na prāpnoti tadāpyasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:397: yadi hetuḥ sādhyaṃ prāpnoti tadā sādhyena saṃsargātsādhyaṃ na sādhayati /
SA15bsa069_u:398: yathā nadīvāri samudravāripraviṣṭaṃ na punarnadīvāri, hetustadvadasādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:402: atha na prāpnoti tadā so 'nyavastuvadasādhakaṃ, tasmaddheturasiddhaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:408: yadi bhavataḥ khaṇḍanamutpattihetusamāśritaṃ tadā siddhaṃ khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:411: uktaṃ mayā yaddhetuḥ sādhyaṃ notpādayatyapi tu parapratipādanārthaṃ sādhyaṃ vyanaktyavyāvṛttatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:416: yathā rūpasattve 'pi pradīpaprayojanaṃ tadvyañjanārthaṃ na tu tadutpattyartham /
SA15bsa069_u:421: yadi tāvaddhetuḥ prāk sādhyañca paścāttadāsati sādhye, hetuḥ kasya sādhakaḥ? /
SA15bsa069_u:422: atha paścāt, sādhyañca prāk, tadā siddhe sādhye kiṃ hetunā? /
SA15bsa069_u:424: yathā yugapatsadbhāvāṅgoḥ śṛṅge dakṣiṇaṃ vāmaṃ vā parasparotpādake ityayuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:428: yatpūrvaṃ samutpannaṃ [Tś_19] tadeva hetunā vyajyate yathā dīpaḥ vidyamānānyeva vastūni vyanakti na tvavidyamānāni vastūnyutpādayati /
SA15bsa069_u:429: bhavān punarutpattihetunā me vyañjakahetuṃ khaṇḍayati tasmādviparītametatkhaṇḍanaṃ, na tu siddham /
SA15bsa069_u:430: atha manyase yadyeṣa heturvyañjakaheturbhavati jñānābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:432: tadā prāptikriyāsambhave heturnāma nopapadyate kriyāsadbhāve tu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:434: taduktaṃ bhavati pūrvaṃ heturnāma nopapadyate paścāttu heturnāmopapadyate /
SA15bsa069_u:435: yaccābhihitaṃ hetuḥ prāk kriyā tu paścāditi tadadoṣam /
SA15bsa069_u:436: athaivaṃ sati, kriyāyā hetuto 'nutpattiriti cedetat khaṇḍanamasiddham /
SA15bsa069_u:445: yadi prayatna[ānantarīyaka]tvācchabdo 'nityastadā yatra prayatno na vidyate tatra nityatāprasaṅgaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:446: yathā vidyudvāyvādīnyaprayatna [ānantarīyaka]āṇyanityeṣu cāntarbhūtāni tasmādanityatve sādhye na prayatnamātraṃ samāśrayaṇīyaṃ prayatnasyāsādhanatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:447: sādhanañcedyatra yatra prayatno nāsti tatra tatra nityatāyāḥ sambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:456: yathā kasyacitpratijñā syāt sarve taravo divyacetanā iti /
SA15bsa069_u:462: śirīṣa eva svapiti na tvapare taravaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:463: sa svapno na sarvāṃstarūn vyāpnoti tasmātsarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ divyacetanatvapratiṣṭhāpane svapno 'samarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:467: naitaducyate mayā yatprayatnaḥ sarvānityatākhyāpane samartho heturanye tu hetavo 'samarthāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:470: asmatsthāpito hetuḥ khyāpanasamarthaḥ, anyo 'pi hetuḥ khyāpanasamarthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:478: yadyahaṃ bravīmi yadyadanityaṃ tattatsarvaṃ prayatnasamutpannamiti tadā prayatnotpattihetoravyāpitvādasiddhatvamiti bhavatā khaṇḍanaṃ vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:480: yadāhaṃ bravīmi śabdābikamanityaṃ prayatnasamutpannatvāttadā yatsarvamanityaṃ [Tś_21] tatprayatnasamutpannamiti nocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:486: yatsamutpannaṃ tatprayatena vyaktaṃ yathā mūlakīlakodakaṃ prayatnena vyaktaṃ na tu prayatnena samutpannam /
SA15bsa069_u:491: kiṃ ghatavadasamutpannaḥ samutpadyate mūlakīlodakavatsamutpanno vā vyajyate?
SA15bsa069_u:499: api tu yataḥ prayatnena samutpannastasmācchabdo 'nitya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:518: yadi bhavato ghaṭadhvaṃsasya dhvaṃse sadbhāvastataḥ sadbhāvāddhvaṃsābhāvaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:527: yadi khapuṣpādīnāṃ sadbhāvo bhavatā nānujñāyate, tadā ghaṭadhvaṃsasyāpi tathātvam /
SA15bsa069_u:536: yatprayatnenopalabhyate yacca prayatnena kriyate tadubhayaṃ bhinnamiti bhavatā pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:542: yaccocyate yadabhivyaktaṃ nityamiti tasya kiṃ prayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:546: prayatna iti vacanaṃ śabdasyānityatāheturiti cettadā kiṃ prāpyate?
SA15bsa069_u:548: etadeva prāpyate, pūrvakāle nitye sati kathamadhunānityaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:551: asmābhiḥ sthāpito heturabhivyaktyartho notpattyartho na vā vināśārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:555: yadi vināśahetunā mām khaṇḍayati bhavān tadviparītakhaṇḍanaṃ syāt /
SA15bsa069_u:556: 10. kāryabhedakhaṇḍanam- kāryyabhedād ghaṭavatacchabda iti na vaktavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:558: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi sthāpite prativādī prāha ghaṭaśabdayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:563: api tu sarvāṇi vastūni tulyena nyāyena kṛtakatvād anityānītyevamuktam /
SA15bsa069_u:578: yathā śabdatvaṃ [Tś_24] śravaṇagrāhyaṃ nityañca, tathā śabdo 'pi tasmānnityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:580: vaiśeṣika āha / yadi nityaṃ hetunā sthāpyate, tato hetukriyatvādanityam / tasmācchabdo 'nityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:582: kasmāt? na mayoktaṃ hetunā nityatotpanneti, api tu heturanityatāṃ vyanakti /
SA15bsa069_u:606: yadi hetuṃ vinā [Tś_25] ghaṭasya nityatā sthāpitā śabdo 'pi nityetāhetumantareṇa nityo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:628: meghe satyapi tu kadācidṛṣṭirbhavati kadācinna bhavatītyanaikāntikatā /
SA15bsa069_u:631: dhūme dṛṣṭe satyagniranumīyate dhūme tvasati agnerabhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:649: tacca cakrasyānaikāntikatā yat pravartanakāle sat, sthitikāle cāsat /
SA15bsa069_u:654: asādharmyaṃ yacchabdaḥ śravaṇagrāhyo 'mūrtaśca ghaṭastu cakṣurgrāhyo mūrtaśca /
SA15bsa069_u:667: [Tś_27] yadi sato nityavaṃ siddhastadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ sada khaṇḍanam /
SA15bsa069_u:682: vastu sahetukañcet tadānityamiti jñeyaṃ ghaṭādivaditi sthāpite /
SA15bsa069_u:690: asadetkhaṇḍanam / kasmāt? yadyasaddravyaṃ nityamucyate daṇḍāghātavinaṣṭavastūnāmapi nityatāpattiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:698: yadi sāmānyavanna nityo bhavet, tadā ghaṭadṛṣṭāntenānityo na bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:701: yadi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavādivyatiriktaṃ syāttadā pṛthaktvena grāhyaṃ draṣṭavyañca [Tś_28] sāmānyantu gavādivyatiriktaṃ pṛthaktvena gṛhyate na ca dṛśyate /
SA15bsa069_u:715: tatsaṅkhyāparimāṇaṃ smṛtidhāraṇārthaṃ, ekaṃ, daśa, sahasraṃ niyutamityādyucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:719: arthavisaṃvādakaṃ viruddhamityucyate, yathā prabhāndhakārau sthitigatī visaṃvādake /
SA15bsa069_u:729: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ [Tś_29] kṛṣṇo bandhyāputraḥ śveta iti tadapi siddham bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:743: etatritayamaprayatna[ānantarīya] kaṃ bhavatā tvekena prakāreṇa nityamiti manyate / tasmādasat /
SA15bsa069_u:751: yadi kaścidvadedandhakāre prabhāstīti tadvacanamapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:754: anityateti pṛthagdharmo 'nityena na sambaddhaḥ yo nityo mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:756: yadyanutpannaṃ vastūtpattiṃ labhata utpannantu vinaśyati tato 'nityamityucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:765: yadi tāvattava khaṇḍanaṃ matpratijñāṃ prāpnoti, matpratijñātulyatve 'smadarthakhaṇḍanāsamartham /
SA15bsa069_u:769: yadi hetuḥ pūrvaṃ pratijñā tu paścāt, tadā pratijñābhāve sa kasya hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:770: atha pratijñā pūrvaṃ hetustu paścāttadā, siddhāyāṃ pratijñāyāṃ kiṃ hetunetyeṣo 'pyasiddho hetuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:771: yadi bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ pūrvamasmatpratijñā tu paścādasmadarthābhāve kiṃ bhavatā khaṇḍyate /
SA15bsa069_u:772: yadyasmatpratijñā pūrvaṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ tu paścāttadāsmatpratijñāyāṃ sthāpitāyāṃ kiṃ bhavatkhaṇḍanena /
SA15bsa069_u:775: mayā prakaṭitaṃ yadbhavatkhaṇḍanaṃ bhavadarthameva pratiṣedhati na tu bhavatkhaṇḍanamavalambyāsmadartho pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:794: dvitīyo mūrdhā rūpagandhādimūrdhākārato na pṛthak mantavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:802: sa tu sanniti tadā dvitīyo mūrdhaviśeṣyo 'pi sanneva bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:803: dvitīyo mūrdhā sanniti bhavatā cenna pratipādyate tadātmanyapi tathā pratipattavyam /
SA15bsa069_u:807: tadāhamapi nyāyāsamaśrayātsanneva dvitīyo mūrdhā na tvātmeti cedvadeyameṣo 'rthaḥ sidvo bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:808: athāsmadartho na siddho bhavadartho 'pi na sidva ityucyate prasaṅgavyaktiḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:810: ātmā dvitīya iva mūrdhāviśeṣyaḥ na tvasanniti cettadā vaiṣamyadoṣo bhavanmūrdhyāpatet /
SA15bsa069_u:811: yadi kaścidvadedvandhyāputraḥ sālaṅkāro bandhyāputro niralaṅkāra iti tadapi siddhaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:816: nyāyāsamāśrayānniyatameva nāsti dvitīyo mūrdheti siddhaṃ ca tadvacanamiti tadā [Tś_32] mūrkhabālānyāyavacanānyapi sidhyeyuryathākāśo dṛśyaḥ,
SA15bsa069_u:818: grāhyoḥ vāyurityādi mūrkhavacanāninyāyāsamāśritānyapi bhavatsādhyavat siddhāni bhaveyuḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:846: yadi kasyacinnigrahasthānāpattirbhavet, na punastena saha vādaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:853: śabda ākāśasādharmyannitya iti cettato yadi vaidharmyaṃ syāt, tadānityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:857: sādharmyaṃ vaidharmyaṃ vā na mayā samālocyate /
SA15bsa069_u:866: vaidharmyaṃ tu sarvamanityaṃ nityavyatiriktamiti niścitaṃ vyanakti /
SA15bsa069_u:877: asparśatvahetunā nityaḥ śabda iti bhavatā sthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:883: yadi heturasiddhastadā pratijñāpyasiddheti prasiddhamiti pratyavasthita idamāha /
SA15bsa069_u:884: śabdo nityatā ceti na mama pratijñā /
SA15bsa069_u:885: api tu nityatā śabdena saṃbaddhā, śabdaśca nityatathā sambaddha ityasmatpratijñā /
SA15bsa069_u:886: yo mayā nirdiṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ sa rūpādiniṣedhārthaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:887: yā ca mayā nirdiṣṭā nityatā, sā nityatāniṣedhārthā /
SA15bsa069_u:889: śabdo nityatāyā na vyatiricyate śrotragrāhyādikāttu vyatiricyate /
SA15bsa069_u:891: mayā na śabdo na ca nityatā sthāpyate /
SA15bsa069_u:892: bhavān punaḥ śabdañca nityatāñca khaṇḍayati [Tś_35] na tu mama pratijñāṃ khaṇḍayati /
SA15bsa069_u:900: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha bhavatoktaṃ sarvamanityaṃ tasmānnityaḥ śabda iti /
SA15bsa069_u:911: 4. pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ / pareṇa svapratijñāpratiṣedhe kṛte saṃnyāso 'samarthaneti pratijñāsaṃnyāsaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:917: iti sthāpite 'paraḥ prāha nityaḥ śabda aindriyakatvāditi bhavatoktam /
SA15bsa069_u:922: tathā hi gavādisāmānyaṃ gavāderabhinnaṃ bhinnaṃ vā /
SA15bsa069_u:925: gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśeta na tu gorvyatiriktaṃ sāmānyaṃ prakāśate tasmāddṛṣṭānto na nityatāsādhakaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:927: [Tś_36] iti dūṣaṇe kṛte prativādī prāha kenaitatsthāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:939: yathā vāyoḥ sparśasya ca sakṛdevābhivaktavāpi vāyuranityaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:946: pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā śabdo nityo dviranabhivyaktatvādityadhunā tūcyate śabdo vāyuvilakṣaṇaḥ pṛthagindriyagrāhyatvāditi prathamahetutyāgena bhavata hetvantaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
SA15bsa069_u:950: nityaḥ śabdaḥ / kasmāt / rūpādipañcaskandhā daśahetupratyayāḥ / etaducyate arthāntaram /
SA15bsa069_u:951: 7. nirarthakam / yadā vāda iṣṭastadā mantrabhāṣaṇamiti nirarthakiam /
SA15bsa069_u:954: yadi kaściddharmaṃ vakti pariṣattu prativādī ca jijñāsāvapi trirabhihitaṃ jñātumasamarthau /
SA15bsa069_u:956: aṇuramūrtaḥ sukhotpādakaḥ duḥkhotpādako 'prāpto sāpakarṣotkarṣaḥ samito 'sannyāso na vināśaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:963: daśavidhaṃ phalaṃ trividhaḥ kaṃbala ekavidhaṃ pānabhojanametadapārthakamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:966: yathā pārimāṇḍalyāśrayasya paramāṇornityatvātpārimāṇḍalyaṃ nityaṃ śabdasyāpi tathātvasambhava iti kṛte 'paraḥ prāha /
SA15bsa069_u:973: yathā gṛhe dagdhe tatparitrāṇāyodakānveṣaṇaṃ tathānavasare 'rtharakṣaṇāya hetusthāpanam /
SA15bsa069_u:981: yadvastu kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ kṛtako 'nityaśceti tṛtīyo 'vayavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:995: atha sādhanasamarthastadā kiṃ hetubāhulyena udāharaṇabahulye 'pi tathātvasambhavaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:998: punaruktaṃ trividhaṃ, śabdapunaruktaṃ, artha punaruktaṃ, arthāpattipunaruktañca /
SA15bsa069_u:1001: arthāpattipunaruktaṃ yathā (kaścidvadet) satyaṃ saṃsāro duḥkhaṃ satyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sukham /
SA15bsa069_u:1005: pūrvavacanasyārtha spaṣṭaśced, dvitīyavacanena kiṃ spaṣṭaṃ bhavet /
SA15bsa069_u:1006: yadi na kiñcit prakaṭayitavyaṃ tadā tadaprayojanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1010: 15. ajñānam / pariṣadā vijñātāyā api pratijñāyāḥ kenacidavijñānamajñānamucyate /
SA15bsa069_u:1011: 16. apratibhā / yadi parasya pratijñāṃ nyāyavadīkṣate dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastadāpratibhā /
SA15bsa069_u:1015: yadi kaścidarthaṃ na vijānāti dūṣaṇe cāsamarthastena saha vādo na kartavya iti /
SA15bsa069_u:1017: anyeṣu nigrahasthāneṣu, sadoṣasya vacanasya vividhenopāyenoddharaṇaṃ śakyam /
SA15bsa069_u:1019: eṣa manuṣyaḥ pūrvaṃ pāṇḍityagauravaṃ sthāpayati, paścāttu pāṇḍityaṃ prakaṭayitumaśaktaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1021: svapratijñāyā doṣaṃ jñātvā vyājaiḥ parihāraḥ kāryāntarakathanam /
SA15bsa069_u:1022: yathāhaṃ svayaṃ rogī, ahaṃ paraṃ roginaṃ draṣṭumicchāmi /
SA15bsa069_u:1023: tadā tu yadi nāpakrāmati paradūṣaṇanirākaraṇaṃ na kalpayati /
SA15bsa069_u:1036: tadarthe ca hīne kiṃ prayojanaṃ dūṣaṇena /
SA15bsa069_u:1045: pūrvaṃ caturvidhe siddhānte svayamaṅgīkṛte 'pi paścāccedyathāsiddhāntaṃ na brūyādayamapasiddhāntaḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1046: 22. hetvābhāsāḥ / yathā pūrvamuktāstrividhāḥ / asiddho 'neikāntiko viruddhaśceti hetvābhāsāḥ /
SA15bsa069_u:1056: yaḥ saśṛṅga sa gaurityanaikāntikaḥ chāgarurvādīnāṃ saśṛṅgatvāt /
SA15bsa069_u:1065: yadi kenacideṣa hetuḥ prayujyate tadā hetvābhāsanigrahasthānāpattiḥ /
